Race.SpecificTitle: Water & Sewer Comm. No. 4 -- Assume outstanding debt - BOC
Race.SummaryText:
Water and Sewer Commission No. 4 Proposition
(Debt Consolidation)

Summary:  Authorizing the assumption by St. Mary Parish Water and Sewer Commission No. 4 of certain outstanding debt of the various waterworks & sewer districts within the jurisdiction of said Commission.
Race.FullText:
Shall the St. Mary Parish Water and Sewer Commission No. 4, State of Louisiana, assume the outstanding debt listed below of the various waterworks & sewer districts within the jurisdiction of said Commission, the particular waterworks & sewer districts and the indebtedness of each to be assumed being more fully described as follows:
Waterworks District No. 6 of the Parish of St. Mary
$720,000 (remaining principal amount) of General Obligation Refunding Bonds, Series 2004, dated March 1, 2004, maturing serially on March 1 of the years 2011 to 2015, inclusive, bearing interest at 3.4%.
$960,000 (remaining principal amount) of General Obligation Bonds, Series 2004, dated April 1, 2004, maturing serially on March 1 of the years 2011 to 2024, inclusive, bearing interest at 2.5% - 6.0%.
$900,000 (original principal amount) of Water Revenue Bonds, Series 2004, dated March 1, 2004, maturing monthly on the 27th day of each month with a final maturity of December 27, 2041, bearing interest at 4.75%.
Sewerage District No. 9 of the Parish of St. Mary
$1,100,000 (original principal amount) of Sewer Revenue Bonds, Series 2000, dated December 5, 2000, maturing monthly on the 5th day of each month with a final maturity of December 5, 2040, bearing interest at 4.50%?
